metadata.title: CVE-2024-38561 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: kunit:Fix kthread reference There is a race condition when a kthread finishesafter the deadline and before the call to kthread_stop(), which may lead touse after free.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-38561` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-6.8.0-40-generic - 6.8.0-40.40
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-40-generic - 6.8.0-40.40
linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-40-generic-64k - 6.8.0-40.40
No subscription required

linux-image-unsigned-6.8.0-1013-aws - 6.8.0-1013.14
No subscription required
